Spurs confirmed team vs Frankfurt - Djed Spence benched as Johnson starts
arts.sum: Ange Postecoglou has named the Tottenham Hotspur team that he believes can overcome Eintracht Frankfurt in their Europa League quarter-final first leg on Thursday night. Here's the team Postecoglou has selected for this Europa League quarter-final clash:

arts.ttl: Spurs player ratings vs Frankfurt - Bergvall shining light again but attack poor
arts.sum: Spurs had a string of chances in the second half with Lucas Bergvall and Rodrigo Bentancur both hitting the crossbar and Son and Maddison forcing the keeper into saves before Micky van de Ven had a late bouncing header tipped over. Frankfurt opened the scoring after just six minutes as Hugo Ekitike struck an excellent low shot into the bottom right corner from outside the box following a break up the pitch after James Maddison was dispossessed in the visitors' half.

arts.ttl: Ange frustrated with 'football gods' after UEL draw
arts.sum: Ange Postecoglou has voiced his frustration with Spurs' luck in front of goal during their Europa League quarterfinal first-leg draw with Eintracht Frankfurt.

Ange on if he was disappointed not to win after our second half display... We stayed in control, we scored a good equaliser, we made them work hard in the first half so we knew in the second half, with our ability to break teams open, we would put them under pressure.
